objects.query: Select Id, Name, Phone, Type, Website, Industry, Ownership, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, RecordTypeId from Account WHERE Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c = true

SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, MobilePhone, Title, Salutation, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingPostalCode, MailingState, MailingCountry, Fax, AccountId, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c, RecordTypeId FROM Contact where Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c = true

SELECT Id, Name, Birthdate__c, Country_Of_Origin__c, Digitized_flag__c, First_Name__c, Gender__c, Last_Name__c, Port_of_Entry__c, Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c FROM A_File__c where Handcrafted_for_eWRTS_Demo_Scenario__c = true
